name: Kemuri
summary: Kemuri summons you into a realm where the unpredictable meets the extraordinary in an urban jungle where mysterious creatures - Yokai- hide amongst the population. Become a Yokai Hunter and use your Fox Window to unravel the mysteries of the city and bring balance to the world. Dive into a thrilling adventure alone or with friends, hunt yokai in style, collect their powers and face even greater challenges.

videos.name: Teaser
